page.title: 03May Fair
page.content: The month of May is here and the caravans and trailers are arriving in Wool:the fair is here. We can hear the continuous thrumming of the generator,the shouts of people enjoying the rides and the music blaring. We enjoy eating candy floss and toffee apples.We have a go at the coconut shy The round-a-bouts go up and down. We feel as though we are flying. "Pick a lucky number",says the notice. We do,and win a gold fish. The coloured lights blaze. People bring their savings to spend. A dodgem ride costs 50p. Whatever will it cost in a few years time? Mr.Hyde (see page 2,Biography) said that when he was a boy a ride on the swing boats cost one old penny.
